dingding.description: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send DingTalk messages

message.description: Specify the message that you want to sent, refer to [dingtalk messaging](https://developers.dingtalk.com/document/robots/custom-robot-access/title-72m-8ag-pqw)

msgtype.description: msgType can be text, link, mardown, actionCard, feedCard
msgtype.title: msgtype

text.description: Specify the message content of dingtalk notification
text.title: text

message.title: message

url.description: Specify the the dingding url, you can either sepcify it in value or use secretRef

key.description: key is the key in the secret
key.title: key

name.description: name is the name of the secret
name.title: name

value.description: the url address content in string
value.title: value

url.title: url

dingding.title: dingding

email.description: Please fulfill its from, to and content if you want to send email

content.description: Specify the content of the email

body.description: Specify the context body of the email
body.title: body

subject.description: Specify the subject of the email
subject.title: subject

content.title: content

from.description: Specify the email info that you want to send from

address.description: Specify the email address that you want to send from
address.title: address

alias.description: The alias is the email alias to show after sending the email
alias.title: alias

host.description: Specify the host of your email
host.title: host

password.description: Specify the password of the email, you can either sepcify it in value or use secretRef

key.description: key is the key in the secret
key.title: key

name.description: name is the name of the secret
name.title: name

password.title: password

port.description: Specify the port of the email host, default to 587
port.title: port

from.title: from

to.description: Specify the email address that you want to send to
to.title: to

email.title: email

lark.description: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send Lark messages

message.description: Specify the message that you want to sent, refer to [Lark messaging](https://open.feishu.cn/document/ukTMukTMukTM/ucTM5YjL3ETO24yNxkjN#8b0f2a1b).

content.description: content should be json encode string
content.title: content

msg_type.description: msg_type can be text, post, image, interactive, share_chat, share_user, audio, media, file, sticker
msg_type.title: msg_type

message.title: message

url.description: Specify the the lark url, you can either sepcify it in value or use secretRef

key.description: key is the key in the secret
key.title: key

name.description: name is the name of the secret
name.title: name

value.description: the url address content in string
value.title: value

url.title: url

lark.title: lark

slack.description: Please fulfill its url and message if you want to send Slack messages

message.description: Specify the message that you want to sent, refer to [slack messaging](https://api.slack.com/reference/messaging/payload)

mrkdwn.description: Specify the message text format in markdown for slack notification
mrkdwn.title: mrkdwn

text.description: Specify the message text for slack notification
text.title: text

message.title: message

url.description: Specify the the slack url, you can either sepcify it in value or use secretRef

key.description: key is the key in the secret
key.title: key

name.description: name is the name of the secret
name.title: name

value.description: the url address content in string
value.title: value
